Sentencas: This paper presents a performance analysis of a planar SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) with proton-conducting electrolyte (SOFC-H(+)).
Titulo: Analysis of a proton-conducting SOFC with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The SOFC-H(+) is fueled by methane and operated under direct internal reforming and isothermal conditions.
Titulo: Analysis of a proton-conducting SOFC with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: A one-dimensional steady-state model coupled with a detailed electrochemical model is employed to investigate the distribution of gas composition within fuel and air channels and all the electrochemical-related variables.
Titulo: Analysis of a proton-conducting SOFC with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The current voltage characteristics of SOFC-H(+) are analyzed and the result shows that the operation of SOFC-H(+) at 0.7 V gives a good compromise on power density and fuel utilization.
Titulo: Analysis of a proton-conducting SOFC with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: However, high CO content at fuel channel is observed at this condition and this may hinder the SOFC-H(+) performance by reducing catalyst activity.
Titulo: Analysis of a proton-conducting SOFC with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The effect of key cell operating parameters, i.e., steam to carbon ratio, temperature, pressure, and water content in oxidant, on the performance of SOFC-H(+) and the content of CO is also presented in this study.
Titulo: Analysis of a proton-conducting SOFC with direct internal reforming
